text:
TAMIL NADU GOVERNMENT GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY
FINANCIAL MEMORANDUM
The Bill provides for establishment of a Fisheries University at Nagapattinam. The Bill when enacted would involve expenditure from the Consolidated Fund of the State. It is, however, not possible at this stage to estimate with any degree of accuracy the expenditure to be incurred as a result of the proposed legislation.
K.A. JAYAPAL, Minister for Fisheries.
A.M.P. JAMALUDEEN, Secretary.
PRINTED AND PUBLISHED BY THE DIRECTOR OF STATIONERY AND PRINTING, CHENNAI ON BEHALF OF THE GOVERNMENT OF TAMIL NADU
135
